hotels.title: Tanzania Escape in Dar Es Salaam with Glistening Pool
hotels.description: Step into the bustling tropical metropolis of Tanzaniaâ€™s coastal hub with a stay at Crowne Plaza Dar Es Salaam, an IHG Hotel. Dar Es Salaam is home to diverse and eclectic markets, sights and excellent local eateries, making it the perfect destination for those wanting to explore the excitement of the expanding city or dive into turquoise coastal waters. Step away from it all and take a moment to enjoy a cocktail before taking a dip in the glistening hotel pool.
